name: The Cube (Astor Place)
description: The iconic Alamo cube sculpture plaza — ultra-smooth ground perfect for flatground sessions and filming.
history: A gathering point for NYC skaters since the 80s. The smooth plaza surface has hosted countless video parts.
bestTimes: Late night for empty sessions. Daytime is busy but rideable.
transitDirections: 6 to Astor Place or N/R/W to 8th St-NYU.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include flat ground, manual pads, benches. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in East Village. A gathering point for NYC skaters since the 80s. The smooth plaza surface has hosted countless video parts.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 6 to Astor Place or N/R/W to 8th St-NYU.. Late night for empty sessions. Daytime is busy but rideable.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot — be respectful of the space and watch for security.
